SELECT s.id, s.dict_name dictName, s.dict_type_id dictTypeId, a.dict_name dictTypeName, s.dict_sort dictSort, s.is_default isDefault, s.status, s.remark, CONCAT_WS('_', b.job_number, b.user_name) createName, CONVERT(s.create_time, char) createTime, CONCAT_WS('_', c.job_number, c.user_name) lastUpdateName, CONVERT(s.last_update_time, char) lastUpdateTime FROM sys_dict_data s LEFT JOIN sys_dict_type a ON s.dict_type_id = a.id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff b ON s.create_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff c ON s.last_update_id = c.user_id
AND s.dict_name LIKE '%${dictName}%'
AND s.dict_type_id = #{dictTypeId}
ORDER BY s.create_time DESC

SELECT s.id, s.dict_name dictName, s.dict_sort dictSort, s.is_default isDefault FROM sys_dict_data s, sys_dict_type a WHERE s.dict_type_id = a.id AND a.dict_code = #{dictTypeCpde} AND s.status = 0 AND a.status = 0 ORDER BY s.dict_sort ASC
